projects.title: EmmaSofia
projects.ingress: Building a unifiying web platform for a non profit
projects.content:
While expanding their work, the communication outgrew EmmaSofia and ended up as being fragmented. They had to manage several different domains and technologies, with a webshop in one place, a website in another, and with manually registration of members and payments.

I made a new unified styleguide, new websites and integrated their existing shopify web shop into their new webpage. I also made a Node.js server to connect different microservices like PayPal and AirTable to make a new automatic member system.

projects.title: MiniØya
projects.ingress: Festival app for a kids festival
projects.content: Bringing your kids to a festival can be stressful enough, before you even start thinking about navigating the festival area. To make it easier for parents on MiniØya to find food vendors, line-up and stage plan, as well as exit areas, I created an app together with Martine Carlson at Empefire.

projects.title: Oh Shit Git!
projects.ingress: A cli tool to help you unfuck your git mistakes
projects.content:
Git is hard: screwing up is easy, and figuring out how to fix your mistakes is fucking impossible.

```bash
npm install -g ohshitgit
```

[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/whatthefoo/ohshitgit.svg?style=social&label=Star&maxAge=2592000)](https://GitHub.com/whatthefoo/ohshitgit/stargazers/)
